original_text: The north border of their land began at the Jordan River, and it went up the hills to the north of Jericho. From there it went west into the hills, to the desert of Beth Aven.
korean_text: 그들의 북방 경계는 요단에서부터 여리고 북쪽으로 올라가서 서쪽 산지를 넘어서 또 올라가서 벧아웬 황무지에 이르며

sentences.original_text: The north border of their land began at the Jordan River
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 땅의 북쪽 경계는 요단강에서 시작되었고

sentences.original_text: and it went up the hills to the north of Jericho
From there it went west into the hills
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 그것은 서쪽으로 언덕 속으로 들어갔습니다

sentences.original_text: to the desert of Beth Aven
